item.title: Software Development: Python Packages
item.description: Architecture Complete Package Structure your_package/ ├── .github/ # GitHub-specific configurations │ ├── ISSUE_TEMPLATE/ # Issue templates │ │ ├── bug_report.md # Bug report template │ │ └── feature_request.md # Feature request template │ └── workflows/ # GitHub Actions workflows │ ├── tests.yml # Testing workflow │ ├── publish.yml # Publishing workflow │ └── docs.yml # Documentation workflow │ ├── docs/ # Documentation │ ├── _static/ # Static files for documentation │ ├── _templates/ # Documentation templates │ ├── api/ # API documentation │ ├── examples/ # Example galleries │ ├── tutorials/ # Tutorial documents │ ├── conf.
